title: Right Now: Lessons from the Life of Elijah
description: Do you want to get Godâ€™s perspective on your life and circumstances? Do you long for a greater depth in your relationship with the Lord? Do you sometimes feel weighed down by troubles and discouragement? Do you need some tools to help turn adversity into opportunity?  In RIGHT NOW, Bryan Guinness draws on the Biblical story of Elijah to highlight some life-changing lessons about faith, suffering, prayer, failure, healing, obedience, and courage. Though Elijah lived some three thousand years ago, his life speaks with contemporary power today.
author: Bryan Guinness
